item.title: Stealing checks worth millions & pwning a bank
item.description:
Another long (hacker) story of mine!
Once upon a time contracted to do a penetration test on a bank…
I spent the better part of a week assessing every nook and cranny of the main web application. I mapped every function, and every web path, but the main website was very hardened. After spending a lot of time understanding it, most of the makeup of the transfer system was API based and the infrastructure was AWS. I decided to open up the mobile application to see if it was any different and if
item.author: (Jason Haddix)
